reference.title: cxxFriend module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe an C++ API friend.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFriend> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the friend, the short description of the friend, the friend syntax, and the friend use description.
Section 11.4 of the C++ standard (ISO/IEC 14882:2003(E)) describes friends.
